product_name: Marin Kentfield CS3 Women's Bike - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Designed specifically for women, the upright geometry and efficient gearing of the Marin Kentfield CS3 Bike make it a great choice for commutes, leisure rides and weekend tours. 6061 aluminum frame features hydroformed top and down tubes to increase strength without adding weight. Bike's overall geometry and flat handlebar provide a comfortable upright ride, minimizing body strains and optimizing visibility. Triple crankset and 8-speed cassette combine to provide 24 gears for fun, swift cruising and efficient hill climbing. Intuitive Shimano shifters and derailleurs provide responsive, smooth shifting. Linear-pull brakes provide slow, controlled deceleration. Integrated suspension cushioning on seatpost offers a smooth, comfortable ride. Vittoria Adventure tires offer puncture protection to deter mood-deflating flats. No special shoes required-platform pedals accommodate a variety of casual shoes. Marin Kentfield CS3 women's bike specs are subject to change. Overstock.
short_description: Designed specifically for women, the upright geometry and efficient gearing of the Marin Kentfield CS3 Bike make it a great choice for commutes, leisure rides and weekend tours.
